body_html:
@jlebar Thanks. I'll split up this PR into smaller chunks. Actually I make sure nothing breaks on either CUDA or ROCm before I submit PRs.

But in order to easily review the changes proposed here, I'll break this PR into following pieces:

  1. interface changes for StreamInterface::CudaStreamMemberHack()
  2. interface changes for pooling
  3. barebone ROCm StreamExecutor implementation, after clang-format
  4. BLAS logic
  5. FFT logic
  6. DNN logic

body:
@jlebar Thanks. I'll split up this PR into smaller chunks. Actually I make sure nothing breaks on either CUDA or ROCm before I submit PRs.

But in order to easily review the changes proposed here, I'll break this PR into following pieces:

1) interface changes for `StreamInterface::CudaStreamMemberHack()`
2) interface changes for pooling
3) barebone ROCm StreamExecutor implementation, after clang-format
4) BLAS logic
5) FFT logic
6) DNN logic
